title: How a Adc feels when a fed Mordekaiser gets a hold of them.

replies.body:
But then they realize that you are the worst morde in NA

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-apQZ6Gu-u7g/VX4gaPenpoI/AAAAAAAAIR8/RAG-8gYqmK8/s400/Laugh%2B3.gif
Hey now, it doesn't matter what kind of Morde you are if you get to play as the enemy for the rest of the fight XP

But then they notice it's an Ashe.

https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/s640x640/sh0.08/e35/12599476_1022783684458231_1629056731_n.jpg?ig_cache_key=MTIyMTg1OTk5NzA0NTAyMzIwMg%3D%3D.2.l

and she turns him into a pin cushion
